JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Process Technical Product Manager at Alfotech
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have extensive experience in the process industry and technical solutions for process plants? Do you have expertise in the food and/or pharmaceutical industries and a desire to combine your technical knowledge with commercial understanding?
Then you might be the right fit for the Product Manager role at Alfotech!

About Us:
Alfotech is a leading supplier of technical components, spare parts, and customized solutions for the process industry. We collaborate closely with clients to develop tailored, high-quality, and innovative solutions. Our expertise covers hoses, fittings, shaft seals, parts for cleaning systems, and pumps. Discover more about Alfotech.

Your Responsibilities:

  • Provide consultancy and handle special projects, ensuring technically sound and commercially attractive solutions for both clients and Alfotech.
  • Support the sales team with technical questions to consistently offer the best solutions to clients.
  • Work closely with our workshop team to design and implement technical solutions for specialized tasks.
  • Maintain and optimize the product database, including the addition of new items and part numbers.
  • Work with marketing to update and present products on our web shop.
  • Identify and evaluate new, relevant solutions and products, engaging both current and potential suppliers.
  • Lead new initiatives and investments in process automation and optimization.
  • Manage technical product drawings in cooperation with an external CAD designer.

Who You Are:
As a Product Manager at Alfotech, you will play a key role in ensuring that we find the right solutions together with our clients. You will combine your technical skills with a strong business acumen, functioning as a technical specialist and project leader. You ensure solutions are both technically robust and economically viable, contributing to Alfotech's growth.

  • You bring a solid process-technical background, such as experience as a dairy technician, process technologist, or similar role, with a strong enthusiasm for process technology.
  • Experience in the food or pharmaceutical industry is an advantage.
  • You have an entrepreneurial spirit and the ability to identify and develop business opportunities.
  • Strong technical skills and the ability to combine them with a business-oriented approach.
  • A proactive problem-solver who takes ownership and follows projects through to completion.
  • You can collaborate across teams and communicate both technically and commercially.
  • Fluent English is required, and Danish is an advantage but not a requirement.

We Offer:

  • A challenging, dynamic role with substantial freedom to shape and drive Alfotech’s development.
  • The opportunity to take responsibility for new initiatives and drive process automation and optimization.
  • Personal and professional development in an innovative and dynamic environment.
  • Competitive salary package and social events with colleagues several times a year.
  • A positive, collaborative work environment where your opinion matters.

How to apply:

If you're excited about taking ownership and driving the success of Alfotech's products and solutions to new heights, please submit your application and CV to job@alfotech.eu by February 16, 2025. For any questions about the role, feel free to reach out to Alexander Hold at +45 7020 0422.

We will be conducting interviews continuously throughout the recruitment process and will wrap up once we’ve found the ideal candidate. We encourage you to apply soon!

We look forward to connecting with you!
